title: [Large-scale] Simulation-Based Project Learning for Medical Leadership Development

context.prior_knowledge: Over three years of practical experience in the medical field and foundational understanding of leadership theories
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented environment using digital devices, strengthening leadership competencies through team-based project execution

learning_goals: Simulate conflict situations in healthcare settings and apply at least three effective decision-making strategies.
Achieve over 80% participation in role allocation and task coordination simulations among team members.
Evaluate leadership competencies during healthcare improvement projects and achieve a performance metric of 4 points or higher (on a 5-point scale).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
